plot: A young girl (Fadiyah) is forced to choose between being loyal to her father and her faith or being loyal to what she believes is right.
title: Martyr
plot_es: A young girl (Fadiyah) is forced to choose between being loyal to her father and her faith or being loyal to what she believes is right.
plot_en: A young girl (Fadiyah) is forced to choose between being loyal to her father and her faith or being loyal to what she believes is right.
